residential.headline: Immaculate Apartment In Kingston Place
residential.description:
Situated in the enviable 'Kingston Place", this immaculate fully furnished one bedroom apartment is sure to please.
Boasting a designer kitchen with stone bench tops and quality appliances including a Gaggenau oven, induction stove top and integrated dishwasher.
The open plan living and dining room flows effortlessly from the kitchen and has a stunning built-in entertainment unit. Opening out through floor to ceiling glass doors, the spacious 17m2 balcony is the ideal place to sit and relax or entertain friends and family.
The master bedroom has a walk in robe with custom drawers and shelving, dedicated study nook and modern ensuite with double vanity. You can also access the balcony from the bedroom.
Located within walking distance to Kingston shops and a short drive to Manuka and the city, this one will not last long.
Features: Beautiful one bedroom apartment Modern kitchen with stone bench Gaggenau oven Bosch integrated dishwasher Electrolux induction stove top Open plan living and dining Built in entertainment unit Huge master bedroom with access to balcony Custom walk in robe Ensuite with double vanity European style laundry Ducted reverse-cycle heating Spacious balcony Single secure parking space and storage
Living: 72m2 Balcony:17m2
Levies: $778.95 per quarter
Rates: $256.00 per quarter

residential.headline: Spacious Living, Huge Sunroom, Core Area - 980m2 Block
residential.description:
Sited on a generous 980m2 block, this unique split level three bedroom ensuite home is sure to suit any growing family.
From the moment you arrive you are greeted with immaculate landscaped gardens, gorgeous established trees, plenty of off street parking plus a circular driveway.
The tiled entry leads you down a few steps to the large living and dining room with extra high raked ceilings and large windows. This beautiful room is perfect all year round with a reverse cycle heating and cooling plus a fire place.
Just off the living room is the kitchen that offers ample storage and preparation space, complete with a new stove and the open plan meals/family room.
Sited along the front of the home are the sleeping quarters all with views to the front gardens. The spacious master bedroom has its own ensuite bathroom and walk through robe. Bedrooms two and three are also a good size and both have built in robes. The oversized original bathroom would look fantastic once renovated to create a large luxurious bathroom.
If you are looking for even more space the enormous enclosed sunroom has brand new carpet and has been freshly painted. With wall to wall windows this light and bright room is perfect as a children's play room, parent retreat or home office.
Outside the large level backyard offers space to entertain under the covered pergola as the children play.
Features: Character filled living and dining room Extra high raked ceilings Generous kitchen with new stove Open plan family room/meals area Fully enclosed sunroom with new paint & new carpet Separate laundry New water tank Reverse cycle air conditioning in the sunroom and living room Landscaped front gardens Huge garden/storage shed Extra large double garageAÂ‚
CORE. AREA - 980m2
LIVING AREA: 130m2
SUNROOM: 38.67m2
TOTAL: 168.67

residential.headline: Spacious and appealing
residential.description:
A beautifully presented family home with loads of extras. Considered great value for money, this up-dated property is located in a quiet cul-de-sac in an elevated position.
Many appealing features include ducted evaporative cooling, ducted gas heating, ceiling fans to all generous bedrooms and ample cupboard space throughout the home.
The galley style kitchen that adjoins the dining and family area, has a dishwasher, gas cooking facilities and a pantry. The bathroom has a bath and a shower recess as well as a separate toilet. There is an ensuite for the spacious and segregated main bedroom.
Keep an eye on the children at play or study in the family room, while preparing a meal. This family area progresses though a sliding door to a large timber deck, bringing the outside in. Great for those who like to entertain or just extra space for family outdoor living.
Adding to the attraction of this residence are landscaped grounds that include generous paved, off-street parking areas suitable for boat or caravan storage and good fencing. There is also a high carport at the rear of the property.
All in all, certainly one to add to your list to inspect and available for a quick settlement if needed.
* Separate formal loungeroom * Carpet to lounge and bedrooms * Tiles floor to dining and family area * Segregated master bedroom with ensuite * Westinghouse gas cook top with range hood * Gas wall oven * Dishlex dishwasher * Ceiling fans to all bedrooms * Awnings to two bedrooms * Built-in robes to all bedrooms * Tastic to main bathroom * Ducted evaporative cooling throughout * Ducted gas heating throughout * Linen cupboard * Separate laundry with access to rear yard * Good fencing * Landscaped with paved off-street parking * High carport * Solar panels * Living area approx. 154.6m2

residential.headline: The Cheapest Piece of Real Estate in Griffith
residential.description:
REDUCED TO SELL!! CURRENTLY TENANTED AT $270 PER WEEK
A wonderful opportunity to secure this ground floor one bedroom unit situated in the ever popular McMillan Gardens complex in Griffith. Perfect for first home buyers, young couples or single professionals wanting to be close to Manuka, the Parliamentary Triangle and the city. It's also a wonderful chance for investors hoping to add to their portfolio with a unit that appeals to a wide demographic of ages and careers.
Stepping inside you'll find an open plan living area with new carpet, featuring dining and kitchen areas with high ceilings and an abundance of natural light. The kitchen offers plentiful storage, good bench space and an electric cook top; there's also the choice of your own internal laundry or communal laundry facilities on-site that come complete with washing machines and clothes dryers.
A generous separate bedroom will accommodate a king or queen-sized bed, as well as hanging space for your clothes, and the ensuite bathroom is finished in neutral tones.
Outside you can relax on your own private verandah or splash away the Summer months in the communal pool within the complex.
Together with the dedicated car space near your front door you'll also find visitor parking inside the grounds. The city, Woden and Fyshwick precincts are within easy reach by car and, considering the apartment's extraordinary location, you may even be tempted to try walking to the closer venues at Manuka and Kingston.
Rates: $218.00 per quarter
Levies; $708.40 per quarter
Private ground floor position within complex
Open plan living/dining room
New carpet throughout
Modern kitchen in neutral tones
Internal laundry facilities
Communal washing machine & clothes dryers also available
In-ground swimming pool
Parking space just outside your door.

residential.headline: North facing apartment with lovely parkland views
residential.description:
Located only metres from the City, opposite the popular and beautiful Haig Park, this one bedroom apartment is the perfect entry level home for the first home buyer or a great investment with a professional tenant currently paying $350 per week.
Nestled on the northern side of the building, on level five, the open plan living and dining room is bathed in natural sunlight and opens out to the sunny balcony with views overlooking the parkland. Finished in neutral tones with a decorative curved wall, this delightful room also offers year-round comfort with a reverse cycle air-conditioner.
The modern kitchen has ample storage both below and above the stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and a drawer dishwasher.
Boasting a sunlit northerly aspect the main bedroom easily accommodates a double bed and has mirrored built-in robes. The bathroom has floor to ceiling tiles, oversized shower and European style laundry with dryer.
Features: North facing apartment Uninterrupted parkland and City views Modern kitchen with stone bench tops Stainless steel appliances including dishwasher Open plan living and dining room Main bedroom with built in robes Bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles and stone top vanity European style laundry with dryer Full height glass sliding doors North facing balcony Secure basement car park & storage cage Walking distance to Braddon and the City
Fantastic tenant on a fixed lease until 2nd August 2015
Rates: $239.85 per quarter
Levies: $920.70 per quarter.

residential.headline: First home or fantastic Florey tenant for investors!!
residential.description:
Set in a quiet complex of only ten at the end of a small cul-de-sac, this delightful two bedroom townhouse is sure to please a wide range of buyers!
Stepping inside you are welcomed with a warm and inviting living and dining room that is filled with sunlight from the large window and glass sliding door.
The open plan kitchen and family room is also light and bright and opens out to the large rear courtyard through floor to ceiling glass sliding doors. The kitchen features neutral tones, electric cooking, large pantry cupboard and breakfast bar.
The two bedrooms are set at the front of the home, both a good size with built-in robes and overlook the front garden. The spacious bathroom has a bath and shower, separate w/c and open vanity area that are all in good condition plus there is also a separate laundry.
Blessed with northern orientation to both the fully enclosed front and rear courtyards, these delightful outdoor areas will be an asset come summer or winter. The front courtyard is enriched by the covered front verandah that is decorated with established vines and has been recently turfed, perfect for young children.
The generous back courtyard is sectioned into different areas by the use of paving. It is very low maintenance with only the established trees and shrubs to look after and is the ideal place to invite friends and family over for a barbeque.
Features: Small complex of ten North facing front & rear courtyards Open plan living and dining Sun-filled family room & kitchen Landscaped private front courtyard Spacious fully enclosed rear courtyard Covered front veranda Single lock up garage Perfectly positioned in cul-de-sac Boutique development of ten Walking distance to shops & Florey primary Currently tenanted to a fantastic long term tenant at $365 per week.
Living space: 93m2 plus garage and courtyards
Levies: $375.00 per quarter
Rates: $320.21 per quarter.

residential.headline: GREAT VALUE IN ISAACS!!
residential.description:
BRAND NEW CARPET AND FRESHLY PAINTED - WORK COMPLETED APRIL 7, 2015.
Just a short walk to the beautiful Isaacs Ridge reserve, this north facing three bedroom ensuite home is sure to be on the list of first home buyers, investors or those looking to down-size.
Set on one level with no stairs, the generous floor plan has an open plan living and dining room and well equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and additional meals area.
The three bedrooms are set at the back of the home all with built-in robes and the master enjoys its own ensuite bathroom. The main bathroom boasts a shower and full size bath, as well as a separate toilet down the hall.
Outside is an enclosed backyard with an extremely low maintenance garden; complete with multiple trees to offer both shade and privacy. There is also a sunny north facing courtyard area at the front of the home.
Perfectly positioned only metres from the children's playground and a short walk to Isaacs Ridge Reserve, this home offers a low maintenance lifestyle freeing you up to enjoy the beautiful surroundings.
Features: Popular "Whispering Pines" complex North facing, free-standing townhouse Perfectly positioned near Isaacs Ridge Reserve Single level living - no stairs Three bedrooms, two bathrooms Open plan living and dining room Kitchen with meals area & breakfast bar Three bedrooms with built-in robes Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom Main bathroom with shower & bath Full sized laundry Freshly painted throughout April 2015 New carpet throughout April 2015 Complex backing children's playground Walking track to the reserve Low maintenance fully enclosed rear yard Double lock up garage
Living Area: 107 m2 approx Verandah: 10.39m2 approx Garage: 22.59m2 approx
Levies $497.25 pq Rates: $358.92 pq

residential.headline: Perfectly Positioned & Beautifully Presented Single Level Villa
residential.description:
Set in a small sought after complex, this gorgeous single level townhouse is ideal for those looking to downsize, invest or a professional couple looking for a spacious home with established, low maintenance gardens in a highly desirable location.
From the moment you arrive you are welcomed by the elegant front courtyard, brimming with established shrubs and flowers. Stepping inside you'll find the formal living room filled with natural light from the large front windows and a sliding door that leads outside. There is also a formal dining room adjacent that would make an ideal home office or rumpus room.
The open plan kitchen has ample storage and adjoins the generous family room, with a dedicated study nook that neatly tucks away and large sliding doors leading to the delightful covered entertaining area.
The segregated master is located at the front of the home and is complete with a dedicated wall of built-in robes, plus it enjoys its own ensuite bathroom filled with natural light from the skylight.
The two additional bedrooms are set at the back of the home and have built-in robes. There is also the beautifully renovated bathroom with separate toilet and powder room that is finished in neutral tones and quality fittings. The spacious laundry leads to the backyard and garden shed.
Outside the courtyard garden is a private oasis with established landscaping - the ideal place to entertain year round under the covered pergola.
Perfectly located within walking distance to Jamison Plaza, Belconnen Shopping Centre, The University of Canberra and Radford College and only a short drive to the City.
Features:
Immaculate villa in "Gossan Gardens" complex Single level three bedroom ensuite home Beautifully maintained by same family for 19 years Light filled spacious living room Separate formal dining room or rumpus room Modern kitchen with dishwasher & new oven (2015) Generous family room with built-in study nook Segregated master bedroom with ensuite & built-in robes Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes Newly renovated main bathroom & separate powder room (2014) Freshly painted throughout (2015) Ducted vacuum system Ducted evaporative cooling Reverse-cycle air-conditioning Gorgeous established front & rear gardens Fully enclosed rear yard with shed Covered entertaining area Secure double garage with undercover access Peaceful complex with excellent neighbours
Rates: $422.50 per quarter Levies: $503.57 per quarter

residential.headline: Views, Space and Lifestyle
residential.description:
Situated in an elevated position with lovely water views and within a short stroll to the nearby foreshores of Yerrabi Pond, this low maintenance three bedroom ensuite townhouse is definitely one of the most sought after in the quiet and peaceful complex.
Stepping inside this well presented home, the entry hallway leads you down to the open living areas on the first floor with an abundance of natural light offering generous living and dining rooms. Immediately alongside is a meals area and kitchen that boasts ample cupboards for storage including a pull out pantry, stainless steel dishwasher, near new oven and cooktop. The laundry is well equipped with additional cupboards for storage and the powder room is also located on this level.
Two side-by-side sliding glass doors allow you to take full advantage of the outlook to Yerrabi Pond. Family and friends will be impressed with the beautiful water views from the living room, courtyard and timber entertaining deck fitted with decking lights and lined with easy care plants.
The top floor comprises two bedrooms and a bathroom, including the master with walk-in robe and ensuite. Both bedrooms enjoy ceiling fans and sliding door access to a second private balcony that spans the width of the home to take in the gorgeous views from a whole new level. The segregated third bedroom is on the lower level complete with built-in robes - perfect for guests or a home office.
Your comfort is ensured all year round thanks to the new roof insulation as well as ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Conveniently located within a few minutes stroll to Yerrabi Pond foreshore, transport and local amenities. Astute buyers will not allow a desirable property such as this one pass them by.
Key Features: Elevated quiet location Small well maintained complex Views to Yerrabi Pond Beautifully presented inside and out Modern kitchen with pull-out pantry Near new stainless steel oven and cooktop New carpets (2014) Ceiling fans to upstairs bedrooms Ducted heating and evaporative cooling New roof insulation (2014) Double automatic garage with internal access Beautiful entertaining deck with built-in lighting Low maintenance landscaped courtyards NBN connected
Living: 126m2 Garage: 37.5m2
Rates: Approx $278.00 per quarter Levies Approx $647.32 per quarter

residential.headline: Position, Presentation ...... Perfection!
residential.description:
Situated on a level block within easy reach of Gungahlin's town centre and just a healthy stroll from Yerrabi Pond, this immaculate four bedroom ensuite home offers more than comfort and convenience that you can enjoy immediately. There's also a flexible floor plan, north facing living areas, an abundance of natural light, freshly painted neutral tones throughout and new carpets installed in the spacious formal areas and bedrooms.
Leading off the formal living room, a sunny and spacious kitchen provides a four burner gas cooktop, stainless steel electric oven and pantry that's bound to make family feasts and entertaining friends a joy rather than a chore.
Alternatively, extend the laughter through the glass sliding doors off the family room and continue the conversation under the pergola in the privacy of your own secure backyard.
Three bedrooms including the master are situated just down the hallway, each featuring built-in robes while the master has a walk-in robe and ensuite. The fourth bedroom is neatly segregated at the front of the house so that it can be easily adapted as a guest room, study or home office.
Other features include additional storage cupboards in the kitchen/family room, Brivis ducted cooling and a Honeywell ducted heating system that's been freshly serviced (March 2015) and an automatic double garage with internal access. It's also Foxtel and NBN ready to keep your data needs at the cutting edge.
Single level living set in a beautiful location with fresh interiors, an adaptable layout and immaculate presentation. There are no more boxes to tick!
- North facing living areas - Immaculate presentation inside and out - Perfectly positioned in a quiet location - Spacious living and dining room - New carpets installed (March 2015) - Generously sized family room - Ensuite and walk- in robe to master bedroom - Freshly painted internally in neutral tones (March 2015) - Freshly painted external areas (March 2015) - Honeywell ducted heating (serviced March 2015 and filter pads changed) - Brivis ducted cooling (serviced March 2015) - Foxtel and NBN ready - Secure and private back yard - Beautifully manicured hedges - Security screens to windows - Automatic double garage with internal access and external access to yard - Close to local schools, Yerrabi Pond and Gungahlin town centre
- Living Area: 157 m2 approx - Garaging: 38 m2 approx

residential.headline: Reduced Price!
residential.description:
Conveniently located near the Town Centre, single level living, well maintained and a small complex of only eight! This special townhouse with a modern kitchen and bathroom is a pleasure to offer for sale.
The open-plan living area has laminate finished floating flooring and the two bedrooms are carpeted. The temperature is comfortable with a reverse cycle air conditioner in the living area, which adjoins the centrally located kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a bamboo bench.
There is internal access to a large single garage with shelving, plenty of storage space and a remote door. Extra parking in front of the garage is a bonus.
Westfield Belconnen, transport and the lake are only a short walk away making this location super convenient. Walk to the numerous offices nearby and save on parking fees.
This appealing home is vacant and ready for a new owner. Those looking for a larger than normal grassed courtyard will appreciate the veggie plot, established shrubs and space for children or pets.
Suitable for first home buyers, retirees, downsizers and investors alike. Be smart and take advantage of the reduced asking price.
*Renewed kitchen with pantry & Omega dishwasher *Euromaid stove *Solid bamboo kitchen bench top *Renewed bathroom, separate toilet *Reverse cycle airconditioner to living area *Laminate flooring to living room *Internal access to garage with remote door *Enclosed rear courtyard *Extra parking space in front of garage *Small complex of only 8 *Body Corporate fees $425.00 (approx) per quarter *General Rates $435.00 (approx) per quarter *Water Rates $152.00 (approx) per quarter

residential.headline: Feature filled
residential.description:
There are so many features to this lovely home that must be inspected. Sitting in an elevated position with views to the mountains, in a quiet cul-de-sac, this property will suit those starting out or even professionals.
From the entry hall there is internal access to the double garage and on the right there are separate lounge and dining rooms with full length windows and insulated blinds.
The kitchen has been up-dated to provide excellent cooking facilities, a dishwasher, new bench tops and a large fridge space as well as filtered water on tap.
Adjoining the kichen is a very generous family room and this room opens to a small deck that overlooks a salt water solar heated relax pool, secluded and sheltered from the street by a courtyard wall.
Dunlop has parks, a pond, local shopping and is only a short distance to schools and major shopping centres.
* Up-dated kitchen includes Blanco 5 burner gas cook top
* 750mm electric oven & vented range hood
* Fisher & Paykel dishwasher
* New kitchen sink with filtered tap water
* Separate lounge & dining rooms
* Laminate finish floating flooring to kitchen & family rooms
* Walk-in robe & ensuite to master bedroom
* Built-in robes to bedrooms 2, 3 & 4
* Spa bath to main bathroom
* Linen cupboard
* Laundry with new solid back door & deadlock
* Ducted gas heating
* Ducted evaporative cooling
* 2 automatic doors to double garage
* Internal access to garage
* Pool blanket & manual equipment
* Living area approx. 149m2
* Garage approx. 36.64m2

residential.headline: Separate title townhouse
residential.description:
Looking for something a little bit different? Then book an inspection today to view this spacious and tastefully renovated, separate title, Willemsen design townhouse that is an entertainer's delight!
Situated in an elevated position on a generous corner block, this home is truly a unique residence offering three separate and functional outdoor areas comprising; a private rear courtyard with covered pergola, a charming and fully paved front entrance which easily accommodates a table setting where you can sit and take full advantage of its warm and sunny northerly aspect, plus a sizeable main outdoor area with a large deck, great for entertaining. The recently extended fence screening provides you with a wonderful sense of privacy and security.
Inside you will find two generous bedrooms, each boasting a fully renovated ensuite and built-in robes. Spacious open-plan living areas are simply delightful and allow flexibility of use. An up-graded kitchen adjoins the dining area and enjoys leafy garden views. There is a large separate laundry plus a generous rumpus room which was converted from a lock up garage.
This courtyard style home also offers an established and colourful low maintenance garden, a tandem carport, ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling, fresh paint, new carpet in both bedrooms and beautiful yet practical laminate finish floating flooring throughout the rest of the house, In addition, the windows are furnished with new slat blinds which complement the wonderful presentation of this delightfully unique home.
* NO Body Corporate fees to worry about
* Kitchen includes a 4 burner gas cooker
* Electric under bench oven
* Flued range hood & LG dishwasher
* Ducted gas heating
* Ducted evaporative cooling
* Electric hot water system
* Separate laundry with built-in cupboards
* New carpets & blinds
* Tandem carport
* Bus stop nearby
* Walk to local shopping centre
* Living area approx. 138.7m2
* Phone for an appointment

residential.headline: Don't Dilly-Dally
residential.description:
Offering approximately 84sqm of living and larger than some townhouses, this stylish ground floor, two bedroom unit represents value for your money in every sense. Priced to the market and an unusually spacious apartment with segregated bedrooms and laundry - no squeezing the washing machine into the bathroom - the modern kitchen and bathroom have been renovated to a high standard with contemporary fixtures, fittings and clever designs that maximise useability.
A fabulous footstep into the real estate market, the apartment features a generous, open living room flowing to an equally generous light-filled kitchen and meals area. With leafy courtyards at both the front and back of the apartment and floating timber-style floors connecting the rooms, the flow between the living areas is fresh and highly appealing. Along with the benefits of being single level on the ground floor, the unit is an ideally situated and presented downsizer close to the local supermarket and bus stop. Astute investors will note the convenient location, maintenance-free presentation, reasonable body corporate fees and an approx. gross yield of 5%.
Located in a small, peaceful complex almost mid-way between Kippax Fair shopping centre and Belconnen town centre, Latham Primary School, Neighbourhood Oval and Umbagong District Park are all close by as are major transport routes.
Neat and sweet, this apartment feels more like a house than a unit thanks to its spaciousness and segregated living areas. Don't dilly dally - this is worth inspecting.
-Delightful ground floor apartment in small peaceful complex -Spacious living room with front courtyard access -Renovated kitchen/meals area with rear courtyard garden access -Kitchen with Westinghouse dishwasher, electric oven -Built-in pantry, storage, plenty of bench space -Generous meals area -Generous bedrooms, both with built-in robes -Approx. 84sqm of living -Renovated bathroom with separate shower and bath -Separate toilet, separate laundry -Timber-look flooring in living areas -Carpet in bedrooms. Electric heater in living room -Designated carport space with rear storage shed -Body Corporate: Units Plan 346 -Body Corporate Fees: $567 per quarter approx. -Gross rental yield approx. 5%

residential.headline: The Present in Page
residential.description:
Life in the present is on offer in this chic, modern three bedroom ensuite townhouse that's perfectly situated for an urban lifestyle, just a stroll away from Belconnen's many inner city amenities.
Contemporary and convenient, the home is only a couple of years old and is in pristine condition. Cleverly designed to ensure maximum comfort and useability, the open plan living and dining rooms are downstairs, separated in the middle by a sleek, shiny kitchen.
The home's fresh, clean lines and sense of space are enhanced by the light flooding into the home. North-facing glass doors in the dining area and generous living room windows allows light to meet light and wash over the entire floor, highlighting the style, decor and neat functionality.
Upstairs the carpeted bedrooms have built-in robes with the main bedroom enjoying a walk-in robe and ensuite. All the modern comforts are here from the reverse cycle air conditioners to the water tank through to the external adjustable shade blinds on the rear bedroom windows.
Outside a neat rear courtyard garden has an entertaining area and enough garden to keep a green thumbed buyer happy. Just the right size, it would be unlikely to become an on-going chore or something that would stop you from going away for a while. The single garage has an automatic door, internal access and a parking space at the front.
Moments from main transport routes and the bus station, everything is on the doorstep here. On the inside there's a smart, tranquil home whose approx. 100sqm of immaculate living space will accommodate your lifestyle, here and now. Be sure to inspect.
-Immaculate, contemporary 2 storey townhouse -Downstairs: Open plan light-filled tiled living areas -Lounge room flowing to kitchen and north-facing dining area -RC/AC's in living room & dining area -Kitchen with gas cook top, electric oven, range hood -Dishwasher, built-in pantry, stone benchtops -Glass sliding doors from dining area to secure rear courtyard garden -Downstairs powder room -Upstairs: Main bedroom with walk-in robe & ensuite -Bedrooms 2 & 3 with built-in robes. -All bedrooms carpeted, each has a reverse cycle air conditioner -Main bathroom adjacent to bedrooms 2 & 3 -Instant gas hot water -Garage with auto door, internal & rear courtyard access. -Rear courtyard with entertainment patio & mulched garden -Body Corporate Fees: Approx. $565 per quarter -Strata Management: Independent BC. UP: 3884

residential.headline: Stylish Contemporary Townhouse
residential.description:
Townhouse 15/18.............. is just in time for those astute buyers who are seeking that perfect buy before Christmas. It is a stylish single level townhouse option as a live-in home or as an investment for those people whom appreciate good florrplan layout and functional lifestyle space.
Boasting very comfortable modern interiors and open plan living with enclosed entertaing spaces for privacy and convenience.
This 2009 built townhouse is in a small boutique style complex and has three respectable sized bedrooms for anyone just starting up or for those investors seeking smart returns with very little maintenance.
Our rational motivated seller has been very clear in their instructions to have this property sold, and we welcome all interest from buyers and their families.
Private requested viewings for busy people are welcome.7.00am -7.00pm are welcome

residential.headline: RAPT FOR CHRISTMAS
residential.description:
Your wish list for a new home might be the perfect yuletide ribbon to tie around this delightful four bedroom, two bathroom gift in Higgins, just a push-bike ride from two grassy ovals and a Sunday stroll from the local shops.
Single level throughout, and thoughtfully extended to provide generous living areas for adults and children alike, its warm brick exterior is matched by an equally inviting interior that will have you stretching out or cuddling up in plenty of time for the New Year.
A large slice of its massive appeal is the open plan layout and the reassuring line of sight out to the backyard lawn over a broad covered deck/verandah, ensuring your kids and pets are always on the visual radar while you're entertaining your friends and family inside. And with such an impressive family room, kitchen and dining room, entertainment is likely to be an indulgence you'll want to embrace.
The treats extend further, too, with all your other creature comforts assured by the home's gas heating, evaporative cooling and extensive insulation underfoot and overhead - it's even Foxtel-ready for the movie or sports buffs who want to settle back over the break.
In the yard you'll find an established garden, a cubby-house and a lawn for this Summer's family cricket matches while, for the adults, there's a double-size carport that's also adaptable for storage, as well as a rainwater tank and a boundary-line protected by Colorbond fencing.
There's even an Oak in the front yard so it's fair to say this is a perfect family Christmas present that's already under the tree.
House:
Size 163sqm approx Four bedrooms, two bathrooms Extended brick home Gorgeous kitchen and open plan living room Generous family room and dining room Entertaining lifestyle home with covered balcony/deck Renovated modern bathroom Insulation in ceiling and floor Two hot water systems, Bosch instant for the bathroom and another dedicated to the kitchen Gas heating Evaporative cooling Dishwasher and gas trivet cook top
Yard:
Level block Double carport currently configured as a single carport and storage Colorbond fencing Backyard garden and lawn with children's cubby house Established front hedge line Rainwater tank

features.otherFeatures: bath, formal lounge, modern bathroom, renovated bathroom, separate dining room, garden

residential.headline: Environmentally Green at " the Fair ".
residential.description:
Lovers of modern styling and low-maintenance living will adore this divine three bedroom terrace home hugging Canberra's established inner north, close to the surrounding mountain bike areas and walking tracks.
This cleverly laid-out lifestyle property is roughly 4 years old and has a property depreciation schedule completed by the current owners for the years ahead; year 3 depreciation here for example was $9,503.00.
The interior is equally impressive, with a captivating entry opening up light-filled interiors that are divided into downstairs living areas and upstairs sleeping quarters. On the lower level the pristine presentation includes quality carpeting, unobtrusive electric heating for warmth on those cold Winter mornings and reverse cycle cooling when you need a cool environment. These gorgeous living areas also open out to a private, enclosed courtyard that's bound to inspire al fresco dining and Summer soirees.
The positioning of this quality property was a significant factor when the current owner purchased it. Sitting adjacent to manicured community gardens, it gives a sense of individuality and extra space that will be both appreciated and desirable.
A staircase leads up to the evening accommodation, where you'll find a master bedroom overlooking and two family bedrooms, all of which include built-in robes.
The beautiful finishes and quality fixtures are the other features likely to leave a strong impression. Bosch appliances, an integrated dishwasher and an open plan kitchen with plenty of storage and preparation space is perfect for those that love cooking and the adjacent dining room will keep the chef involved in the conversation throughout the meal.
This community title property presents extrordinary value for buyers - roughly 8 kilometres from the city, only minutes away from Gungahlin and Dickson and a surprisingly short drive to the airport, it also enjoys the convenience of local schools, parklands and Watson's local shopping centre.
Three spacious bedrooms with built-in-robes Large master bedroom Convection radiators and reverse cycle airconditioning Additional powder room on lower level A generous and private courtyard with established gardens Family room/meals area off kitchen Modern kitchen with Bosch stainless steel appliances Stainless steel dishwasher Abundance of cupboard and storage space Internal laundry Open plan design Single garage with separate street access Energy efficient solar gas hot water system Walking distance to local schools, Watson shops, walking trails, playing fields, reserves and Mount Majura Easy walk to EPIC, Farmers Markets and transport Administration and sinking funds are $2889,60 pa.

residential.headline: Renovated, to boast about!
residential.description:
This property will impress with renovations carried out over the years to please. For anyone seeking those better things in life incorporating modern interiors and generous gourmet style kitchen with polished stone benchtops and modern stainless appliances. The bathroom alone is a delight with generous large glass shower space and floor to ceiling quality tiling to appreciate.
If you dont want to renovate or have the hassle of upgrading a space to comfortably live in, then this is the apartment/townhouse that should be firmly on your radar this spring of 2015.
Here is an extremely modern space to either live in or have as a low maintenance superb investment. Come and see if this is the property that you would love "To Boast About", to family and friends....... as being all yours!
Polished stone benchtops Superb pantry and cupboard storage space Overhead stainless steel bistro style exhaust extraction European style laundry Fantastic tiled bathroom/oversized glass shower. Open plan living with polished modern tiling Very large inverter airconditioning and heating Great sized balcony to just chill out on.

residential.headline: Dunlop 221 sqm Sanctuary
residential.description:
Spanning an inviting street frontage, this is a home featuring a generous open floor plan that epitomises relaxation and the ideal family lifestyle.
The generously proportioned interiors achieve a fusion of traditional charm and contemporary living that's highlighted by inspired details such as the beautiful usage of parquetry flooring - all resulting in a home crammed with character and laced with light.
Set on a split level layout and positioned just footsteps from a green belt and cycle path, the interior features four generous bedrooms, including a segregated and impressively-proportioned master and second bathroom complete with spa bath and a purpose-built home office with professional joinery. Flowing interiors and a functional kitchen meld into the multiple living areas to round out a remarkable family residence that can easily accommodate a range of family needs, ages and lifestyles.
With a large double garage, terraced grounds and a covered entertaining area as well as thoughtful touches like a stencilled driveway.
Even the backyard is ready with space for those winter vegetables to be planted and the much appreciated garden shed to look after all the things that go with your precious garden and Vegetables through the seasons ahead.
The position is ideal, too, only a short stroll to local schools and with easy access to shops and bus routes. Unique, contemporary and carefully crafted throughout for indoor or outdoor entertaining, it's a property that also offers style, privacy, grace and taste wrapped up in a low-maintenance environment.
FEATURES:
UV $274,000 Block size 633.7 sqm House Size 221 sqm
Ventis air recirculating air system Fully ducted Large reverse cycle air-conditioning system Security Alarm Dishwasher and modern kitchen oven and cook top appliances
Generous modern kitchen with ample storage High ceilings with halogen down-lights Segregated master bedroom with full bathroom and generous walk in Robe Study/Home office room with established joinery 3 bedrooms with bathroom in segregated wing Separate powder room
Large separated living rooms when families need their own space, and a formal lounge room with beautiful parquetry flooring Main bathroom with large spa bath Large double garage with internal access
Terraced outdoor areas with established landscaping Covered entertaining area Stencilled concrete driveway Excellent proximity to transport and schools

residential.headline: THINK OUTSIDE THE SQUARE
residential.description:
Queanbeyan's close proximity to Fyshwick, Canberra airport and the Parliamentary Triangle make it an easier commuting distance than many suburbs within the Territory and this gorgeous top-floor, two bedroom/two bathroom in a fresh complex adds another attraction. Sited on the western edge of the town, with easy access to Canberra Avenue, it was built in 2010 to the standards you expect in modern design, featuring open pathways and garden beds at the entrances as well as underground parking for your vehicle.
Inside the secure apartment there's a fabulous open-plan living/dining room and kitchen that adjoins a large outside balcony through expansive floor-to-ceiling windows. Adaptable and full of light, they provide a combined internal/external living area that will quickly become the natural centre of your weekend life. Radiating off the corners are two inviting bedrooms separated by the main bathroom; the master also features an ensuite.
The convenience to facilities isn't limited to Canberra either. You'll also find excellent shopping nearby in the township's main retail areas, as well as the local school and transport within walking distance.
Previous rental return was $440 per week which makes this is an oustanding opportunity for home buyers and investors alike. Buy it for yourself now and rent later, or become a landlord immediately and keep it as an investment. Think outside the square and consider what's just over the border.
Features include:
Master bedroom with large ensuite Bedroom 2 with large built in wardrobe Spacious combined meals/living area Reverse cycle air conditioning in living room Neutral tiled flooring throughout common areas Modern stone bench tops Quality Euromaid appliances throughout Tiled main bathroom with bath over shower Internal European laundry Two secure underground car spots Body Corporate $525.20 per quarter (approx.) Land Rates $406.00 per quarter (approx.)
Close to:
Queanbeyan West Public School 400m (approx.) Queanbeyan Hospital: 1.9km (approx.) Riverside Plaza: 2.3km (approx.) Canberra Airport: 8.5km (approx.) Canberra CBD: 13.3km (approx.)

residential.headline: A HEART-STOPPER FOR HOME STARTERS
residential.description:
North facing and sited on the top floor rear corner of this well maintained block in Young Street, this functional two-bedroom apartment presents an excellent entry point for home starters or friends needing shared accommodation, as well as older investors who will recognise its attractions immediately.
Naturally light and bright, with the cross ventilation afforded by its elevated position, its logical no-fuss layout makes the most of every centimetre to provide two excellent bedrooms plus an open plan living area and kitchen. The bathroom adjoins an internal laundry and there's a surplus of drying lines in the block's grassy rear yard.
Rented by the same family for 3 years at $300 per week, the tenants' departure has prompted the current owner to give another investor or owner-occupier an opportunity to reap the same rewards.
Buy for yourself now, then retain the ownership and rent to others later. Or purchase with the intention of the apartment becoming your family's passive income long into your retirement. It's an investment that may keep your loved ones forever Young.
Two spacious bedrooms with built in robes Light filled living/dining area Neutral colour scheme throughout Renovated kitchen Second level Excellent location in quiet complex Previously tenanted at $300 per week Internal and separate laundry Strata Fees: $375.00 per quarter (approx.) Land rates: $396.00 per quarter (approx.)

residential.headline: SURPRISING SIZE - POSITION POSITIVE
residential.description:
Fronted by established trees and shrubs, the kerbside attraction of this four bedroom home is just a hint of what you can expect inside the front door.
Immaculately presented and in wonderful condition, the interior features neutral decor, timber flooring and a superb central kitchen that commands the run of the home - from the formal living and dining areas at the front to the east-facing bedrooms and even the glorious, light-filled family room at the rear which is lined by windows looking out to the gardens.
The master bedroom at the rear includes a spacious ensuite and an entrance wall of robes, while each of the family bedrooms remain in easy parental reach as they edge towards the front of the home. The entire property has been freshly painted both inside and out, plus Colorbond roofing was installed in 2012.
The private rear yard is terraced and remarkably long, currently including a paved area for BBQs or basketball practice and providing plenty of space for children or pets as well as an enormous expanse for gardeners and family cultivators. There's also a double garage with a similar sized workshop/storage area and off driveway parking for two more cars.
Located in an elevated loop street, even the position is excellent with community facilities such as child care and a preschool opposite as well as bus routes and shops within easy reach. Mount Rogers Reserve is only a few hundred metres away, too, if you're looking for exercise or pleasant walks.
This superb property is sure to appeal to discerning buyers looking for solid value and great fundamentals in a remarkably buoyant market.
Features include:
Four spacious bedrooms all with large built-in-robes Ducted gas heating Solar hot water Renovated bathroom and toilet (2006) Renovated kitchen (2002) with dishwasher Large family room extension to rear of home in 1999 External and internal painting just completed Back to base security system Large walk-in pantry Ceiling fans in kitchen and 3 bedrooms Generous sized laundry Hardwood timber floor through front living spaces Colorbond roofing installed in 2012 Watering system in main garden beds Double garage with large storage/workshop and 15 amp power Private and secure rear yard Ample under house storage Low maintenance and landscaped gardens Living area: 188sqm (approximately) Block size: 957sqm (approximately) Land rates: $1,685. Per annum (approximately)

rental.headline: Refreshed And Ready
rental.description:
Contact our office today to arrange an inspection. Refurbished, refreshed and re-painted this cute, light-filled one bedroom flat is now ready for you.
Private and purpose-built, the self-contained flat is one side of a house, only sharing front and back yards with the adjoining flat.
The flat offers a refreshed kitchen with electric stove, plenty of storage and bench space, a large bedroom with built-in robe, sunny living room, separate laundry and bathroom and new window treatments throughout. There's a shared carport and designated shed for bikes or extra storage.
Located in a peaceful Page street, the location is superb. Belconnen's Westfield Mall, offices and bus interchange are all within walking distance and main transport routes to the City and beyond are easily accessed.
Features:
-Refreshed, light and sunny self-contained flat -Living room with leafy outlook -Kitchen with new bench tops, electric stove, new flooring, -Washing machine included -Large bedroom with built-in robes -Neat bathroom with shower -Generous tiled laundry -Own front door with new flyscreen door -Leafy back yard, perfect for relaxing -Shared double carport -Garden shed -Close to Belconnen town centre -Gardening services included** -Pets considered upon application
**Please talk to the property manager for further information.

rental.headline: Fabulous Family Home
rental.description: Stylish 3 bedroom family home close to schools, shops and public transport. This home features sundrenched living areas, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances/dishwasher, a spacious dining area which flows out onto a covered outdoor deck set in landscaped gardens. The ducted gas heating will keep you warm in the cooler months. Double lock up garage. 5 minutes to Gungahlin Shopping Centre.

rental.headline: New beginnings
rental.description:
Conveniently located within minutes of the heart of Gungahlin, sits this beautifully presented one bedroom apartment.
Offering so many of life's little luxuries, it won't be long before you're picturing yourself cooking up a storm in the spacious modern kitchen, kicking back enjoying the benefits of reverse cycle in the living area or entertaining family and friends in the private covered courtyard.
The spacious bedroom is fitted with a built-in robe and provides access to the small rear courtyard.
The beautifully appointed modern bathroom is equipped with an oversized shower plus there is an additional separate European laundry with a dryer as an added bonus.
Located close to Gungahlin Leisure centre, local shops and public transport.
Features - One bedroom apartment - Spacious modern kitchen with ample storage space and dishwasher - Reverse cycle air conditioner - Bathroom featuring an oversized shower - Private covered courtyard - Bamboo timber flooring - European laundry - One secure underground carpark with storage cage - Close to shops and transport
Pets will be considered upon application.

rental.headline: Great Beginnings
rental.description:
This delightful townhouse is located in a small, quiet complex in the popular inner Belconnen suburb of Cook.
Stepping inside you will find a spacious light and bright open plan living and dining room with timber look flooring. Just off the living and dining room is the sunny kitchen with a new stove and ample cupboard space.
The two bedrooms both feature built in robes. Just off the hall is the main bathroom with bath tub and separate shower.
The beautiful paved front courtyard is the ideal spot to sit and relax or to entertain family and friends. While the back courtyard is spacious and low maintenance with a ready-made vegetable garden waiting to be planted..
Within close proximity to Belconnen Town Centre, Jamison Plaza, University of Canberra, AIS and only a short drive to Canberra CBD.
Features: -Open plan living and dining room -Sunny kitchen with electric cooking -Two spacious bedrooms both with built in robes -Bathroom with bathtub and separate shower -Reverse cycle air conditioning and underfloor insulation -Spacious, private and easy to maintain front and rear courtyards -Single carport with additional lockup storage room

rental.headline: Fully furnished apartment!
rental.description:
Presenting this ground floor, 1 bedroom unit located in the Kingston Foreshore in the "Viridian" complex.
This property is fully furnished and equipped.
The property offers open plan living and is fitted with a gourmet kitchen. Including the added benefit of an extra large entertaining courtyard for relaxing, this property
Located in walking distance to restaurants and bars as well as outstanding views.
Features include: Study nook Reverse cycle air conditioning Underground parking spot

rental.headline: Country Charm
rental.description:
Presenting this great two/three bedroom property in an exceptional position where you can set up residence for peaceful living.
Sited on a lazy chicane adjacent to a large paved precinct , it's a home that you'll adore because of its peaceful oulook and be thrilled by its convenient access to local facilities.
Featuring a Federation style throughout you'll be delighted by it bull-nosed verandah and the charm of internal high ceilings as well as abundance of modern extras like stainless steel appliances, a two-way bathroom and a secure rear yard.
Features include:
2 bedrooms with built-in-robes Study or multi-purpose room High ceilings throughout Evaporative cooling Gas wall furnace Modern open plan kitchen/living that flows outside Stainless steel appliances Gas cook top Federation style home Secure pet and child friendly rear yard Abundance of natural light through living spaces Very large two way bathroom
*Pets will be considered upon application*

rental.headline: Convenience and affordability!
rental.description:
Situated close to the local Kingston restaurants, cafes & the shopping precinct is this light filled and comfortable first floor apartment which is sure to tick all of the boxes.
Offering two generous sized bedrooms, both with built in mirrored wardorbes, a modern spacious kitchen and large living areas opening out onto private balconies.
A separate toilet for your convenience, spa bath to the bathroom and a single lock up garage are added features.
